meanings.definition: A type of cactus known for its large, showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cereus in the garden bloomed with beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a cereus with big, colorful flowers at the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The cereus decided to show off its stunning flowers to all the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a cereus in full bloom, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The cereus flowers were so vibrant, they seemed to glow in the moonlight.

meanings.definition: A genus of cacti native to the Americas.
meanings.sent1: The cereus plants in the desert are well-adapted to the dry climate.
meanings.sent2: Many cereus species can be found in the wild across the Americas.
meanings.sent3: The cereus family reunion was a prickly affair.
meanings.sent4: The cereus cacti stood tall like guardians of the desert.
meanings.sent5: The cereus cacti swayed gently in the breeze, a symbol of resilience.
